Comment: It's baffling to consider this is a *lifelong* belief of Trump's, having heard him speak on the topic.  Imagine anyone who has had an interest in a hobby for any length of time. They know details about it, can describe things about it, can easily answer questions and are willing to offer up their knowledge.  Now consider Trump's simpleton responses to tariff questions, and his discussions of tariffs in general. There's nothing there. No substance, he starts deflecting and making wild claims almost immediately. His answers to questions regularly contradict his tariff statements.
